thread.title: Katie Price and Kieran Hayler hit Fifty Shades premiere
thread.title_full: Katie Price and Kieran Hayler hit Fifty Shades premiere | Daily Mail Online

author: Becky Freeth for MailOnline
title: Katie Price and Kieran Hayler hit Fifty Shades premiere
text:
The headlines have been dominated by her Simon Cowell sex confessions.
But Katie Price only had eyes for husband Kieran Hayler on Thursday night, as she proved their marriage is very much 'Fifty Shades Darker'.
Former glamour model Katie could not keep her hands off her man as they hit the London premiere for the film with their own amorous display.
Scroll down for video
Busting out: Katie Price and husband Kieran Hayler hit the red carpet for the London premiere of Fifty Shades Darker on Thursday night
Bust out a bodysuit by Sexy Smalls £25 Sexy Smalls bodysuit
Wear it backwards like Katie!
Buy now
The Fifty Shades Darker premiere took place in London last night and there were some killer looks on the red carpet.
From Dakota Johnson in Alexander McQueen to Rita Ora in Miu Miu and Amelia Warner in Rosetta Getty, the designer labels were coming thick and fast. But thankfully some of the guests kept things a little more affordable so stealing their style won't be as tricky.
Katie Price looked her usual sultry self in a pair of shiny wide leg trousers which she styled with this mauve bodysuit by Sexy Smalls. What an appropriately named brand for this particular occasion!
It actually has a plunging neckline and a harness detail (very Fifty Shades) but Katie opted to wear it backwards, thereby creating a low back. So however you want to style it why not click (right) to buy it now?
Or get the look with our similar all-in-ones below.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET ONE LIKE IT £20 Missguided lilac bodysuit
Buy now
£59 Mistress Rocks lilac bodysuit (now reduced to £49)
Buy now
£12 Prettylittlething.com bodysuit (now reduced to £6)
Buy now
£12 Boohoo bodysuit
Buy now
Though her PDA was enough to distract many, Katie drew attention to her sizeable chest in an extremely tightly-fitting top.
It stretched across her enhanced assets as she paired it with feminine gold pleated trousers for the red carpet appearance.
Kieran's ensemble was similarly eye-catching but more so because of its ill-fitting nature.
Busty: Katie wore a top that stretched right across her enhanced bust
Kisses: Katie puckered up to give her husband a delightful kisses in front of the cameras
Can't keep her hands off: The blonde bombshell simply couldn't keep her hands off
He teamed an animal print blazer with skinny fit trousers but omitted any socks when it came to his relaxed loafers.
With his shirt tucked in, the hefty hunk struggled to button up his blazer while fawning over his wife.
It was just this weekend that mother-of-five Katie spilled all on her intimate night of passion with music mogul Simon.
Ladylike look: She added gold pleated trousers with peep toe heels
Date night: The duo were out to see particularly racy flick Fifty Shades
Recalling the moment she entered his palatial home, Katie admits to being unsure if he was still in a relationship with TV presenter Terri Seymour – with whom he separated in 2008 – after seeing her belongings scattered about the property.
‘We kissed. I got undressed and we got into bed together,’ she revealed. ‘His bedclothes were all white.
'He had a really hairy chest and I got this real sense of being with a man for the first time. He was the oldest person I had been in bed with.’
Admission: Katie has this week confessed to spending a passionate night with Simon Cowell during her glory days as one of Britain’s most successful glamour models
'It affected me more than I realised': Emotional Katie told Loose Women on Wednesday that being the victim of sexual abuse aged 7 led her into 'provocative' glamour modelling
Talking it out: She chatted to Ruth Langsford, Saira Khan and Janet Street-Porter about her ordeal
But Katie's bold appearance also comes only one day the revelation that she was sexually abused at just seven years old.
In an interview with Loose Women on Wednesday, the 38-year-old said she believes the terrible incident led to her pursuing a glamour modelling career.
She said: 'There was the sexual assault and I was later raped, which I have discussed before and I do believe it led to me dressing provocatively and becoming a model.'
Bold: Katie's appearance also comes after brave revelation of abuse at seven
Early night: It looked nippy outside, as the pair darted across town
Heading home: They linked arms as they dashed quickly to a car
Big hair, don't care: Katie looked like she'd coiffed her hair before coming outside
Early night? The bombshell joked about watching too much sex on-screen, later that night
Cold out there? The model seemed to feeling the chill
Linking arms: She stuck closely to Kieran for support
Backless beauty: Katie's top featured a low plunge at the back
